dcterms:creator: I. Hamed
N. T. Vu
S. Abdennadher
dcterms:description: The ArzEn corpus serves as a valuable resource for linguistic research and the development of NLP systems capable of handling code-switched Egyptian Arabic-English while preserving cultural aspects.
dcterms:title: ArzEn corpus

dcterms:creator: I. Hamed
N. Habash
S. Abdennadher
N. T. Vu
dcterms:description: ArzEn-ST is a three-way speech translation corpus for code-switched Egyptian Arabic-English, extending the ArzEn corpus with translation in both primary (Egyptian-Arabic) and secondary (English) languages.
dcterms:title: ArzEn-ST

dcterms:creator: R. Al-Sabbagh
dcterms:description: ArzEn-MultiGenre is an aligned parallel dataset of Egyptian Arabic song lyrics, novels, and subtitles, with English translations, designed for benchmarking new machine translation models.
dcterms:title: ArzEn-MultiGenre
